testcase.name: convertJSON2POJO

error.message: Unexpected character ('}' (code 125)): was expecting double-quote to start field name at [Source: (String)"{ "name":"Scott", "location":"France", "phone":"123456", "courses": ["c","c++"], }"; line: 6, column: 2]
